title: Maintenance has screwed over my game
body:
I didn't have this problem up until Maintenance happened today.

Whenever I go into a game, the whole HUD is blinking and spazzing. If I hit tab I can see portions of the map where I'm standing blink in out constantly. The lower right half of my screen right above the minimap is distorted, almost as if portions of the screen near it are overlapping (blinking again).

I tried a full repair but when I went into the practice tool to test it the whole thing was spazzing yet again.

Help? I've never had this happen to me before, and after a playing a whole game with it(since it was ranked) I started to feel a bit sick.

replies.body: Oh wow, this sounds like a pretty serious hardware or driver issue that's failing to render properly.  Just in case, double check your air vents to make sure your pc has solid air flow.  Reinstalling is a good step, but I also recommend checking drivers and settings too.  Run through each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide too to rule out these possibilities as well.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps.

So I tried reinstalled with no effect. I also tested it on some of my other games(stardew valley and garry's mod if that matters) with no problem.

My graphics card is up to date and I checked my air vents and they're fine. What do you suggest?

The only things I didn't do it install .netframe and do a clean boot on my computer, but surely there's a different way?

It's really important to make sure your OS is up to date and has all necessary products to run League or anything else.  If this has already been done and going through the entirety of the crash guide didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will work with you individually to help figure this out!

If you've downloaded the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), grab the logs they provide and attach them to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!

It's only when I play league though. And I didn't have a problem with it until Maintenance today.

I'll reinstall and see if that fixes the problem!
And i still can't get on, on one of my accs x))
